1.0.0.name: wordpress/modernizr
1.0.0.description:
This plugin adds the Modernizr to your WordPress installation. Modernizr is a small JavaScript library that detects the availability of native implementations for next-generation web technologies, i.e. features that stem from the HTML5 and CSS3 specifications. Many of these features are already implemented in at least one major browser (most of them in two or more), and what Modernizr does is, very simply, tell you whether the current browser has this feature natively implemented or not.

For documentation visit http://www.modernizr.com/docs/
